question_text: Which of the following are important to verify during expansion card installation? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Card is seated evenly in the slot
Card is screwed securely to the chassis
Card has at least 2 USB ports
correct_answer: Card is seated evenly in the slot
Card is screwed securely to the chassis
explanation: Proper seating, mechanical securing, and slot retention are key to stable expansion card installation. USB port count is irrelevant here.
